movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the Titanic.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson through the eyes of a man with a low IQ.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and redemption.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.
